sQuestion: Michael rented a truck for one day. There was a rental fee of 20.99 dollars , and there also was a charge of 25 cents for each mile. Michael paid 95.74 dollars when he returned the truck. For how many miles did he drive the truck?

sentences.sentence: Michael rented a truck for one day.
There was a rental fee of 20.99 dollars , and there also was a charge of 25 cents for each mile.
Michael paid 95.74 dollars when he returned the truck.
For how many miles did he drive the truck?
